WRITING.TITLE: [Request][PC][Steam] Rocket League
WRITING.TEXT:
First Request on GOG. :)
About the game :
Rocket League is a multiplayer online game which include two of my favorite things, that is, SOCCER CARS. Driving meets soccer. It has a fairly large player base.
Why I want it :
First off I am a big fan of soccer and cars. A lot of my friends play this game and I would love to play it with them and other players online. It currently is free for the weekend and I am having a blast with it and can't stop playing it.
Why I can't afford it :
Well I am a student and as many students are,I too am broke. I did have some savings but lost them all in repair works of my motorcycle after I met with an accident last week.
Conclusion :
This is my first ever request on GOG and I hope I am doing it right. Thank you for reading through my request.
Bonus : The game is currently at 30 % off on the Steam Market.
[Link to the game page on Steam](http://store.steampowered.com/app/252950/Rocket_League/)
[Link to my account](http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198299619543/)
Thank you! Have a wonderful day. :)

WRITING.TITLE: Please help!
WRITING.TEXT:
I just bought my Moto G4 Plus today. Was in the process of updating to Nougat. The update downloaded . After the "Preparing to update" dialogue box reached 100 percent the phone blacked out. When I connected the charger the LEDs at the bottom started blinking. But I am 100% sure that the battery was above 75 percent before it blacked out.
The phone is completely non responsive at the moment. Please help.
Edit : Issue resolved. Thank you guys.
